name: FlagFact
0:
”Alexa, open flag fact”
”Alexa, ask flag fact teach me a new flag”
”Alexa, ask flag fact I want to learn a new flag”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flag fact
des: When you ask Flag Fact skill, It will teach you a new country with it's information. If you have an alexa device with screen, you can also see flag of the country
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
